Desc.entry: Anglican church for the parish of Frecheville. Other activities include women's groups, after school club, youth club, out of school care, Ofsted registered (for details check the calendar page on the website), an elderly person's day centre (see separate entry) and a community transport scheme (see separate entry).

ProviderServiceDetails.entry: Bookings for banns, christening and weddings

ProvisionDaysAndTimes.entry: Sunday Service at 10am (Holy Eucharist), 2nd Tues in the month at 2pm (Healing Service, please check calendar page on website for details), Mondays and Thursdays (elderly persons day centre at Church Hall on Birchvale Road), Wed at 10.30am (Morning Prayer & Holy Eucharist)
